Projects Blog About
AURORA

How can one, through a design process, try to mitigate and prevent the complex emotional issues that arise in connection with the change of season from summer to winter?

prototypeuniversity
FLOSS-UX

A project trying to enrich user experiences in FLOSS projects through discussion and collaboration. Share your experiences, perception, motivation or methods for how you handle UX in working with FLOSS projects, and help create awareness about the issues in the field.

thesisopen-source
SaveMore

Most danish youth does not have a savings account. This project, made in collaboration with Nordea, used theory from behavioral economics to attempt to mitigate this issue.
